content: as before pull the yarn as tight as possible this will start to create visible booty cheeks repeat this process two of three more times then tie off and sew in any remaining ends positive pickle sign make a sign with a positive saying out of cardstock or notecards and a uncurled paperclip or small piece of dowel i ll always be here to tell you that you are a big dill questions and sharing reach out to me at magicalthinkingknits@gmail com or on ravelry with any questions i would love to see what you make i am @magicalthinkingknits on instagram happy making
